task.title: Viewing Pipeline and Stage Statistics
task.shortdesc: When you monitor a pipeline, you can view real-time summary and error statistics for the pipeline and for stages in the pipeline.

context.p: monitoringviewing statisticsBy default, the console displays pipeline monitoring information when it runs a pipeline. You can select a stage to view the statistics about the stage. Similarly, you can view error information for the pipeline and its stages.

The Monitor panel displays statistics on the following tabs:
Summary
For a pipeline, displays the record count for the pipeline, record and batch throughput, batch processing statistics, and heap memory usage.
For a stage, displays record and batch throughput, batch processing statistics, and heap memory usage. You can hover over different parts of the charts to view exact numbers.
Error For a pipeline, displays histograms for the number of error records by five minute decay and the number of error records by stage since the pipeline started. For a stage, displays the number of error records and the number of stage errors.
